Home.text: is a sole proprietorship limited liability company. It primarily operates in the energy sector, particularly in the following areas:
Home.li1: Civil Engineering of HV/MV/LV electrical substations.
Home.li2: Assembly and Installation of HV/MV/LV overhead and underground electrical lines.
Home.li3: Assembly and Installation of HV/MV/LV electrical substations.
Home.li4: Commissioning tests and Start-up of HV/MV/LV electrical substations.

references3.description: Installation, testing, and commissioning of electrical and control equipment for the 30/10 kV PST4 substation, TINDOUF.
Supply of electrical equipment and protection and control systems; disassembly, installation, assembly, cabling, testing, and commissioning of all supplied equipment.
